author: tabish
msg: ActiveMQInputStream will read the destination options and can be made to sync send via producer.alwaysSyncSend=true
Also remove the test cases dependency on port 61616.

author: erwan
msg: Using the type time for a field, when input-method=time-dropdown doesn't remove the date fields. Now, only hours and minutes are visible.

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-3289: add options to FST Builder to tradeoff RAM/CPU used during build vs how small the resulting FST is
